text: Loris Reina (born 10 June 1980) is a French football player who last played for the Belgian club, KV Kortrijk. == Career == The left back has previously played for Olympique Marseille. After three seasons, the 29-year-old French defender has left SV Zulte-Waregem to sign for KV Kortrijk on 19 June 2009. ==References== * * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Olympique de Marseille players Category:AS Nancy players Category:Servette FC players Category:R. title: Loris Reina
